effect.name: Random Sample Bloom - MipMap Ready - DX11 Only
effect.description: A 180-point sample bloom using pre-defined points in a randomized circular pattern. "Mip map ready" meaning if Fusion allows for mipmaps in the future this should just work and look much better.
effect.author: n89

parameter.name: Radius
parameter.description: Radius of the bloom in pixels.

parameter.name: Threshold
parameter.description: The value below which colors are clamped. (0.5 means anything darker than gray becomes black.)

parameter.name: Multiplier
parameter.description: How much to multiply the remaining colors after threshold. Recommended vals: if Thresh 0.5 = Mult 2. Thresh 0.75 = Mult 4. Thresh 0.9 = Mult 10. Etc...

parameter.name: Boost
parameter.description: An optional boost to the bloom brightness. Can create sun glare and dreamlike effects. Keep less than 0.5
